roleset.name: attest the truth or validity of

role.descr: hearer, who something is affirmed to

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01, nouns parts 1 & 2. Framed by Claire. Member of FN Statement. Associated verb maps to affirm.01, VN classes admire-31.2, conjecture-29.5-2, indicate-78-1-1.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: He followed up with an affirmation that he would never do it because he would never find those guts .
example.arg: that he would never do it because he would never find those guts

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He shrugged slightly at the horror in Serenity's voice as she talked, nodding his affirmation to her that yes, he was a demon.
example.arg: that yes, he was a demon.
